sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; const AdminDashboard = () => { const [stats, setStats] = useState({ totalSales: 0, totalOrders: 0, totalCustomers: 0, todayOrders: 0, }); useEffect(() => { const fetchStats = async () => { try { const [salesRes, ordersRes, usersRes, todayOrdersRes] = await Promise.all([ axios.get("http://localhost:3001/api/totalsales"), axios.get("http://localhost:3001/api/totalorders"), axios.get("http://localhost:3001/api/totalcustomers"), axios.get("http://localhost:3001/api/todayorders"), ]); setStats({ totalSales: salesRes.data.totalSales || 0, totalOrders: ordersRes.data.totalOrders || 0, totalCustomers: usersRes.data.totalCustomers || 0, todayOrders: todayOrdersRes.data.todayOrders || 0, }); } catch (error) { console.error("Error fetching dashboard stats:", error); } }; fetchStats(); }, []); return (
{/* Sidebar */}

  • Reviews
  • Products
  • Reports
    • Yearly Sales
    • Monthly Sales
{/* Main Content */}

); }; export default AdminDashboard;
